file_content.text: [You examine a datacore pulled from the Corellian droid's wreckage and read its final log entry.]
System corruption detected. Source of malicious code: Imperial command droid units.
Attempting syst0egjsr010001011000reprogram complete. Imperial protocol activated. Calibrating weapons to fire on Corellian rebels.
[Imperial command droids turned this Corellian model against the resistance. If you destroy the Imperial droids, you should be able to stop them from corrupting more followers.]
